comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of June 11, 1914 reports that Olga Nethersole sailed on the Aquitania for London the day before. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C0CE2D6173AE633A...

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks to you all for pinning down the probable date and connecting Nethersole up to biographical information. We'll add some information to the description when we next update. In comments on another portrait of Nethersole, trialsanderrors pointed out the theatrical posters in our collections from about a decade earlier that advertise Nethersole's performance in the role of Sappho .
